1.0.0.name: wordpress/latest-vine-video
1.0.0.description:
Vine: a mobile service that lets you capture and share short looping videos. Like Tweets, the brevity of videos on Vine (6 seconds or less) inspires creativity. Now that you can easily capture motion and sound. you can read more about vine at Vine Blog

This plugin used to fetch the latest vine video posted at twitter using hashtag.

For more plugins, themes and WordPress support , Please visit http://www.csschopper.com/
